model.name: Rose des Vents PM
model.disambiguatingDescription: The refined shape of the one-handled Rose des Vents handbag looks precious in crocodilian leather. This versatile city bag is finished with a padlock and the House's iconic keybell, details that embody Louis Vuitton’s DNA. The luxurious top handle makes elbow carry a joy whist the removable strap is perfect for cross-body wear.

image.contentUrl: https://jp.louisvuitton.com/images/is/image/lv/1/PP_VP_L/louis-vuitton-rose-des-vents-pm-クロコダイル・ブリリアント-handbags--N99574_PM2_Front view.jpg?wid={IMG_WIDTH}&hei={IMG_HEIGHT}
image.name: Front view

model.material: クロコダイル・ブリリアント

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Noir Rose Finish/Black Pink
  • Brilliant Alligator leather
  • Brilliant Alligator-leather trim
  • Goatskin lining
  • Light Gold-color hardware
  • Closure system with a lock
  • 2 compartments with a pocket in the middle
  • Inside zipped pocket
  • Inside flat pocket with removable mirror
  • Key bell
  • ストラップ：取り外し可能, 調整可能
  • ストラップの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最短)：50.0 cm
  • ストラップの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最長)：52.0 cm
  • ハンドル：シングル

This reference is either Made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

model.name: Rose Des Vents PM
model.disambiguatingDescription: The refined shape of the one-handled Rose des Vents PM handbag looks precious in crocodilian leather. This versatile city bag is finished with a padlock and the House's iconic keybell, details that embody Louis Vuitton’s DNA. It can be carried in several different ways thanks to its top handle and removable adjustable shoulder strap.

This versatile city bag is finished with a padlock and the House's iconic keybell, details that embody Louis Vuitton’s DNA. The luxurious top handle makes elbow carry a joy whist the removable strap is perfect for cross-body wear.

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
- Beware not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces, especially the leather trim.
- As they have a natural treatment, the exotic skins must imperatively be protected from humidity. Keep them away from water or from any other liquid that could alter the leather's texture or color. If your product does get wet, you can dab it dry with a lint-free, light-colored and absorbent cloth.
- Avoid direct exposure to sunlight, keep your product away from any direct source of heat (radiators, car interiors overheated by the sun, etc).
- Avoid contact with greasy substances, cosmetics, perfume, and hydroalcoholic solutions, as well as any material (magazines, other leathers, etc.) that may transfer their colored pigments onto the product.
- In order to protect your product when you are not using it, store it in the felt protective pouch provided.
Specific care instructions:
Crocodilians, python and lizard skins are particularly sensitive to humidity and heat . We recommend that you avoid any cleansing cream or product that would deeply stain your product. In case of superficial stains, you may use a clear, dry and soft cloth. These species are protected by the Washington convention: in certain cases, a CITES of exportation accompanies the product.
Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.
For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Exotic Leather product beautiful as the year pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :
